QuestData.Title: Bring Down Those Shields
QuestData.Description: Look at the button on the side of the controller here. I bet if you got close enough to one of those scourging crystals, you could use the controller to bring its shield down. Then it would simply be a matter of destroying the thing before its shield goes back up.$B$BBrave enough to hazard another trip down there, $n? I can guarantee a nice reward for you if you can bring down those shields and destroy the crystals.$B$BHow can you refuse if it means less Scourge, especially ones made from murlocs?
QuestData.LogDescription: Apothecary Anastasia at the Apothecary Camp has asked you to destroy 3 Scourging Crystals.
QuestData.CompletionText: You still haven't destroyed enough scourging crystals. No reward until you do so.
QuestData.RewardText: <Anastasia turns and smiles at her succubus.>$B$BVery well, $n, I concede that you have certainly earned a choice of one of these.
